name: MENOS: PSI-SHATTER
description:
A High-impact Action Shooter with a Telekinetic protagonist. Throw enemies and pick up weapons with your mind while battling through the depths of Site Echo, a research facility losing control of a world consuming force.

FEATURES:

-30 stages of fierce, tactical, close-quarters combat.


-Your ESP lets you see through walls. Use line of sight to your advantage as the enemy closes in.


-Switch weapons on the fly by pulling the guns of fallen enemies into your trigger hand.


-Barrel enemies into one another with your mind or use the environment as your weapon.
